programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. Will it change anything for them?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10665734/","name":"Interior","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODliNTA0M2MtZDA2Ni00OGJlLTg2Y2ItYWIzOTY0YzIwMjcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. programme.title: Playing by Heart
Playing by heart
programme.desc: Playing by Heart: Directed by Willard Carroll. With Angelina Jolie, Dennis Quaid, April Grace, Patricia Clarkson. Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145734/","name":"Playing by Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTMxYmVmZTgtZjc5Yi00N2VmLThmNGUtOGNiM2QwODJmMzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145734/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sylenski"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Positively Charming . . .","reviewBody":"When I first came across this movie I was somewhat unconvinced by the blurb given on the back of the DVD. However, I decided to give it a chance any way (mostly due to the excellent ensemble cast) and I found that I was completely surprised - this movie was positively charming ! Granted, it is not without its slightly exaggerated moments but in the end this does nothing but add to its charm ! Angelina Jolie's character, Joan is delightful if somewhat melodramatic and Gillian Anderson does a great job as the relationship-shy Meredith enraptured with, yet afraid to commit to, the charismatic Trent. Sean Connery's performance is effortless and the rest of the cast are all excellent as well. There are light moments and completely heart-breaking moments but all in all - it ends on such a high note of hope that one cannot help but be delighted !\n\nDefinitely worth your time - 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-01-22","keywords":"manhattan new york city,sister sister relationship,cheating,chicago illinois,divorce","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Playing By Heart","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3790577177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000096/","name":"Gillian Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000995/","name":"Ellen Burstyn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

Overscheduled and running late, her parents can't pick her up on time on the last day of school before Christmas break. programme.title: Evolution
Evolucija
programme.desc:
Evolution: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With David Duchovny, Julianne Moore, Orlando Jones, Seann William Scott. A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0251075/","name":"Evolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU3YjhjZmItNzBjNi00YWVjLWE0ZGQtNGY1NTFmMDczMzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0251075/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FiendishDramaturgy"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is Under-rated!","reviewBody":"While this film is far from a masterpiece, Evolution deserves better ratings than it currently enjoys here at IMDb. The cast and crew contribute superior work, and the storyline is quite inventive. The premise has been done a few times before, however, it has never been done quite as well as the treatment it receives here.

Alien spores land here on Earth and begin to wreak havoc.

I found this highly entertaining, cleverly witty, with a slick production quality which tends to draw in the audience, who finds its members laughing, sometimes in spite of themselves. You won't WANT to like this. There is a large amount of juvenile humor, which usually would detract from a work such as this, but this is a sci-fi comedy that WORKS.

Again, it's no masterpiece, but it IS clever and fun, in spite of the sophomoric humor.

It rates a 7.3/10 from...

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
xXx 2: Stanje pripravnosti
programme.desc:
xXx: State of the Union: Directed by Lee Tamahori. With Willem Dafoe, Samuel L. Jackson, Ice Cube, Scott Speedman. Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0329774/","name":"xXx: State of the Union","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4ZGQ2OGItNGQ4NC00MWVmLTgxMzktYThjNmRlNjYzYjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0329774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Derivative, uninspired nonsense but will please the male Saturday night crowd that it is clearly aimed at","reviewBody":"Someone is targeting the old unit that Agent Augustus Gibbons used to belong to under the command of George Deckert, now Secretary for Defence. Half the unit are dead, Triple X agent Cage is dead and Gibbons' underground base has been infiltrated by a highly trained team from which he barely escaped. With his gadgets expert in tow, Gibbons turns to a new Triple X agent to help him fight this threat  former comrade and now life prisoner, Darius Stone. Busting Stone out of prison, Gibbons arms him and helps him start his new mission by uncovering hidden information; as the danger increases, so does the pace and all clues lead to something very sinister indeed.

The production company credits right at the start of the film proclaim this as an "Original Films Production", a claim that I thought highly ironic since it then plunges into a pre-credit sequence that is as genre-specific as they come, a title sequence that is a clear Bond rip off and a film that delivers nothing more than the genre basics. Taking the lead from the first film, the script kills off Xander Cage with barely a mention and moves on to the new agent. Discussion of the plot is pointless cause the whole affair is nonsense with logic holes so large that you could drive a souped up car through it. Those looking to this for a story that they can get into will be sorely disappointed as the film throws its energy into noise, explosions and typically OTT action scenes. To me and many viewers this will be just annoying hollow spectacle but to the target audience this is all they require and xXx2 does do it noisily enough to satisfy them.

The action is as stupid and illogical as the plot itself but it is noisy, stupid, big and bold and is enjoyable on that level; it is a shame that it lacks any actual tension or excitement but the noise will be enough for the target audience. At times it all gets a bit much and just looks plain silly but it never really stops moving that long so the next boom or bang is only ever minutes away, preventing you turning your brain on. The attempts at character and story are the worst  the moments with the girls really slows things down without adding even titillation value, while the potentially brave political stance made by the drawing of the president is just lost and wasted. Ice Cube picks up the mantle and delivers a one-note performance where he basically sneers his way across the screen; he lacks any sort of charisma here and could have been any old actor (something I think those hoping to make a franchise hope will be the case). Jackson is just collecting the cash so his bad performance can be ignored but Dafoe is a terrible bad guy considering he has done it well in other films. Xzibit doesn't do much but will draw humour from the MTV teenage audience thanks to his "Pimp my Ride" personae being called on. Mabrey and Gayle are basically just eye candy, with breasts squeezed and lifted in every scene  they can't act and don't have any chemistry with the basic Cube. The support cast do lots of running around with guns or diving away form bangs but nobody gets close to a performance.

Overall this is a noisy genre flick, nothing more and nothing less. Those claiming how awful it is forget that there are people who don't want art films, emotional films or engaging dramas, they just want to whoop and holler as things get blowing up in fancy-looking ways. For them, and them alone, this film will do the job as it provides effects, stunts and noise. However those looking for even the most basic characters, plot, tension, excitement or development will find themselves yawning through this noisy cross between a hip-hop video and a video game."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69383,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-04-27","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,slow motion scene,spy,stabbing,reference to johnnie cochran","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx: State of the Union","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2080309529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001084/","name":"Ice Cube"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Znam što si radila prošlog ljeta
programme.desc:
I Know What You Did Last Summer: Directed by Jim Gillespie. With Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Freddie Prinze Jr.. Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119345/","name":"I Know What You Did Last Summer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI4ODJlNGUtNjFiMy00ODgzLWIzYjgtMzgyZTljZDQ2NGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119345/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Spleen"},"dateCreated":"2000-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well, the title's pretty good","reviewBody":""I Know What You Did Last Summer" joins "The Spy Who Shagged Me" and "The Cook, the Thief, His Wife and Her Lover" as being yet another film that doesn't even come close to living up to its inspired title. All are bad enough to make me angry at the thought of a good title being squandered.

Kevin Williamson's script suggests nothing so much as a man trying, and failing, to capture the charm of the first couple of seasons of "Buffy, the Vampire Slayer" - this is more obviously a good description of "Scream", but "Scream", and this may surprise some people who've seen it, is better. -Or maybe he wasn't even trying. I'm not sure which is worse. I think Williamson WAS trying for a quality we might term "cred", by having his central characters bitch and squabble all the time. Friends in "Buffy", on the other hand, genuinely support one another. That's a large part of the show's charm. It's a charm that could only have helped Williamson's script, if only by making it more realistic: however much his central characters might have fought amongst themselves in the ordinary course of events, faced with a powerful EXTERNAL threat, they would surely have closed ranks.

Neither this nor "Scream" is particularly bad. The main trouble is that "I Know What You Did Last Summer", as well as wasting a good title, also wastes a good premise. Some teenagers feel guilty after their car accidentally knocks someone down; they hide the body and then they THINK they can just safely sneak back to their old lives ... the story could have gone in many good directions from here, and it's a pity all that occurred to Williamson was to head for regions slasher-horror so well travelled I'm surprised they don't sell souvenirs.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1997-10-17","keywords":"stupid victim,taking a shower,mystery killer,characters murdered one by one,part of trilogy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"I Know What You Did Last Summer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi663666457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDBiYmQtZDJkNC00NjQxLTlkZWEtMzMyN2RkOTBkY2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDBiYmQtZDJkNC00NjQxLTlkZWEtMzMyN2RkOTBkY2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001349/","name":"Jennifer Love Hewitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000162/","name":"Anne Heche"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0318947/","name":"Jim Gillespie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033437/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242028/","name":"Lois Duncan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0119345, Title: I Know What You Did Last Summer, --- Description: I Know What You Did Last Summer: Directed by Jim Gillespie. With Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Freddie Prinze Jr.. Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119345/","name":"I Know What You Did Last Summer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI4ODJlNGUtNjFiMy00ODgzLWIzYjgtMzgyZTljZDQ2NGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119345/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Spleen","dateCreated":"2000-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well, the title's pretty good","reviewBody":""I Know What You Did Last Summer" joins "The Spy Who Shagged Me" and "The Cook, the Thief, His Wife and Her Lover" as being yet another film that doesn't even come close to living up to its inspired title. All are bad enough to make me angry at the thought of a good title being squandered.

Kevin Williamson's script suggests nothing so much as a man trying, and failing, to capture the charm of the first couple of seasons of "Buffy, the Vampire Slayer" - this is more obviously a good description of "Scream", but "Scream", and this may surprise some people who've seen it, is better. -Or maybe he wasn't even trying. I'm not sure which is worse. I think Williamson WAS trying for a quality we might term "cred", by having his central characters bitch and squabble all the time. Friends in "Buffy", on the other hand, genuinely support one another. That's a large part of the show's charm. It's a charm that could only have helped Williamson's script, if only by making it more realistic: however much his central characters might have fought amongst themselves in the ordinary course of events, faced with a powerful EXTERNAL threat, they would surely have closed ranks.

Neither this nor "Scream" is particularly bad. The main trouble is that "I Know What You Did Last Summer", as well as wasting a good title, also wastes a good premise. Some teenagers feel guilty after their car accidentally knocks someone down; they hide the body and then they THINK they can just safely sneak back to their old lives ... the story could have gone in many good directions from here, and it's a pity all that occurred to Williamson was to head for regions slasher-horror so well travelled I'm surprised they don't sell souvenirs.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1997-10-17","keywords":"stupid victim,taking a shower,mystery killer,characters murdered one by one,part of trilogy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"I Know What You Did Last Summer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi663666457","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDBiYmQtZDJkNC00NjQxLTlkZWEtMzMyN2RkOTBkY2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDBiYmQtZDJkNC00NjQxLTlkZWEtMzMyN2RkOTBkY2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001349/","name":"Jennifer Love Hewitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000162/","name":"Anne Heche"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0318947/","name":"Jim Gillespie"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033437/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147895/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242028/","name":"Lois Duncan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc:
Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict. A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. programme.title: The English Patient
Engleski pacijent
programme.desc: The English Patient: Directed by Anthony Minghella. With Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe, Kristin Scott Thomas. At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116209/","name":"The English Patient","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkxZTdkNTQtM2QwOS00NzRlLWEyMGItYTcxOTE4NTgyNGVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mattymatt30"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"An epic tale of doomed love","reviewBody":"'The English Patient' can rightly be compared to the films of David Lean, whose sweeping epics such as 'Lawrence of Arabia' and 'Bridge on the River Kwai' must have inspired the director Anthony Minghella. The film is beautifully photographed, and like 'Lawrence', is set in Northern Africa, but during the second world war. The story is complex, but it boils down to a forbidden love between an opinionated and often difficult archeologist played by Ralph Fiennes and a married woman played by Kristin Scott Thomas.\n\n The story, based on a novel by Michael Ondaatje, is told in flashbacks by Fiennes' Count Laszlo de Almasy - the titular character. The fact that his name does not sound like he's English plays a key role in what unfolds. He has been badly burned in a plane crash, occurring just as the film opens, and is being cared for back in Europe by Hana, an army nurse played by Juliette Binoche. What makes this story epic is the vast sweep across place and time, and the development of characters beyond that of the two ill-fated lovers. The film makes clear that true love and passion, even with dreaded consequences, can make life worth living, or worth dying for. If you're a romantic at heart, and can appreciate a film without the standard happy endings and simple moral codes, you may find that 'The English Patient' speaks directly to you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185344,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"1996-12-06","keywords":"patient,nurse,flashback,english,church","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'The English Patient' !?!?! Anniversary Mashup","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi618447641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg","description":""What do you love? ... Say everything." In celebration of the 25th anniversary, we look back at Anthony Minghella's nine-time Oscar-winning film."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034657/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648546/","name":"Michael Ondaatje"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116209/","name":"The English Patient","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkxZTdkNTQtM2QwOS00NzRlLWEyMGItYTcxOTE4NTgyNGVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116209/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mattymatt30","dateCreated":"2004-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"An epic tale of doomed love","reviewBody":"'The English Patient' can rightly be compared to the films of David Lean, whose sweeping epics such as 'Lawrence of Arabia' and 'Bridge on the River Kwai' must have inspired the director Anthony Minghella. The film is beautifully photographed, and like 'Lawrence', is set in Northern Africa, but during the second world war. The story is complex, but it boils down to a forbidden love between an opinionated and often difficult archeologist played by Ralph Fiennes and a married woman played by Kristin Scott Thomas.\n\n The story, based on a novel by Michael Ondaatje, is told in flashbacks by Fiennes' Count Laszlo de Almasy - the titular character. The fact that his name does not sound like he's English plays a key role in what unfolds. He has been badly burned in a plane crash, occurring just as the film opens, and is being cared for back in Europe by Hana, an army nurse played by Juliette Binoche. What makes this story epic is the vast sweep across place and time, and the development of characters beyond that of the two ill-fated lovers. The film makes clear that true love and passion, even with dreaded consequences, can make life worth living, or worth dying for. If you're a romantic at heart, and can appreciate a film without the standard happy endings and simple moral codes, you may find that 'The English Patient' speaks directly to you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185344,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"1996-12-06","keywords":"patient,nurse,flashback,english,church","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'The English Patient' !?!?! Anniversary Mashup","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi618447641","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg","description":""What do you love? ... Say everything." In celebration of the 25th anniversary, we look back at Anthony Minghella's nine-time Oscar-winning film.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034657/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648546/","name":"Michael Ondaatje","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"],"duration":"PT2H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shattered Glass
Razbijeno staklo
programme.desc:
Shattered Glass: Directed by Billy Ray. With Hayden Christensen, Peter Sarsgaard, Chloë Sevigny, Rosario Dawson. The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0323944/","name":"Shattered Glass","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDI2OTc2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTA5MjM3._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0323944/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jay4stein79-1"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant","reviewBody":"I had been recommended Shattered Glass a half-dozen times by a friend. He said, after watching it - it's not a great movie, but it is really, really good. I'll disagree. Shattered Glass is a great movie.

It's not a great film (aye, there's the rub), but it is a great movie. It's entertainment, pure and simple, but it's also entertainment with depth. In that respect, it's a little like Spider Man 2.

In Shattered Glass, you'll find steady direction, sure-handed editing, an interestingly designed narrative, characters that are drawn well-enough but not so well that they overpower the story's forward movement, etc. You'll also find excellent performances.

Peter Sarsgaard, Chloe Sevigny, Steve Zahn, Rosario Dawson - they're all excellent (which they've all proved in other movies as well). Hayden Christensen, though, who was so wooden in Star Wars Episode 2, is amazing. His portrayal of Glass, though not perfect, is revelatory; he can actually act. Given time and the aid of excellent directors, Christensen will really blossom. Shattered Glass is, simply put, a solidly made movie about a journalist without the requisite integrity.

But why isn't this a great film and only top-notch entertainment? Well, it really comes down to the simple fact that Shattered Glass only scratches a surface that, in light of Jayson Blair and those of that ilk, deserves a little more attention. Of course, though, this is a film about a single event. It's not about compulsive lying or, really, lack of journalistic integrity. It touches on those subjects without delving into them. That is my only complaint. As a movie about a lying journalist, though, it's fast-paced, thrilling, and entertaining, and I think everyone will enjoy it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34812,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2003-11-26","keywords":"fabricated facts,journalistic fraud,writer,magazine,journalist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shattered Glass","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1955004697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTkyNjJjMzEtNmZjMC00NjBjLWJmZjMtOGRjODM1MzYxZmY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTkyNjJjMzEtNmZjMC00NjBjLWJmZjMtOGRjODM1MzYxZmY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Lionsgate"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159789/","name":"Hayden Christensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001872/","name":"Steve Zahn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712753/","name":"Billy Ray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094885/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084334/","name":"Buzz Bissinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712753/","name":"Billy Ray"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Flyboys: Directed by Tony Bill. With James Franco, Scott Hazell, Mac McDonald, Philip Winchester. The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454824/","name":"Flyboys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDg5NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjA4MDUzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mgenovese-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cinematic Clichés fly as often as the planes","reviewBody":"Do not expect much from the plot as you need not scratch the surface too deeply to experience de'ja vu. (I've seen these plot elements before in just about every war/buddy/love story flick I have ever seen). 

The acting is decent and the special effects are superb. Do not see this movie with high expectations regarding the plot and you will not be disappointed. 

The effects wizards took a page from Howard Hughes as there are plenty of clouds in the air combat scenes to lend a feeling of depth and speed. The dog fights are pretty exciting and worth the price of admission to see on the big screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42270,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2006-09-22","keywords":"zeppelin,world war one,world war one soldier,flight,cockpit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flyboys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3316056345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhOGUxZWQtZTc5ZS00MDUxLTk0ZjAtOGRhOTE0ZWM1YTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhOGUxZWQtZTc5ZS00MDUxLTk0ZjAtOGRhOTE0ZWM1YTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"pre st, grn band, "Coming Soon", lbx"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213847/","name":"Jennifer Decker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082300/","name":"Tony Bill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003899/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229966/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780785/","name":"Phil Sears"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262575/","name":"Blake T. programme.title: Stir Crazy
Šašavi robijaši
programme.desc:
Stir Crazy: Directed by Sidney Poitier. With Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams. Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0081562/","name":"Stir Crazy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFkM2NiYTktODYwOC00NmI5LTgyNmItYTYzZGU1ZTJiN2E5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU4Nzk4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A hundred and twenty five years... Oh God, Oh God... Ill be a hundred and sixty one when I get out.","reviewBody":"Stir Crazy is directed by Sidney Poitier and written by Bruce Jay Friedman. It stars Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Miguel Angel Suarez, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams and Erland Van Lidth. Plot has Pryor and Wilder as two care free New York buddies who after getting fired from their jobs decide to make their way to Hollywood in search of better fortunes. However, after taking up a gig as promotional woodpeckers for a bank's advertisement drive, they find themselves framed for robbing the bank and sentenced to 125 years each in prison ..

The second pairing of Wilder and Pryor proves to be the best of their output on film. With their chemistry skin tight, film is full of laughs until a big slow down for the last third when the inevitable attempt at a prison break out occurs. Poitier's direction isn't up to anything other than correctly letting his two lead stars strut their stuff. But along with writer Friedman, he has to be accountable for letting the comedy dry up as the film chooses tension over humour which undoubtedly doesn't sit at all right. Still, the first hour is a joy ride, particularly once the guys land in prison, here the comedy reaches its peak and the contrast of the two characters played by Wilder and Pryor really mines the set-up for all is worth. Wilder is oblivious to the hazards of prison life, Pryor is street savvy and fully aware of the perils around every brick walled corner.

Naturally there's a hope on the horizon, which here comes in the form of Rodeo skills, this too brings the laughs, as does the number of prison characters that join in the plot. Notably Van Lidth's monstrous, and monstrously funny, Grossberger. Yes it's a roll call of prison stereotypes, from the top where the morally dubious Warden (Barry Corbin) sits, down to the cons where gays, bullies and gate happy loonies reside. With that, some of it now seems twee and badly out of date. So much so it's a film that is unlikely to garner a new and appreciative audience. However, those who were enamoured and found themselves laughing heartily with it back in the early 80s, should find that like myself, it holds up real well. Kind of like an old friend you call on when you need a pick me up. Hardly a superior comedy classic, then, but a film that rewards its fans on each subsequent revisit. 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1980-12-12","keywords":"prison,prison yard,cell mate,woodpecker costume,jail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stir Crazy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi910212889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000698/","name":"Gene Wilder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001640/","name":"Richard Pryor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113617/","name":"Georg Stanford Brown"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001627/","name":"Sidney Poitier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295171/","name":"Bruce Jay Friedman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085883/","name":"Charles Blackwell"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0081562, Title: Stir Crazy, --- Description: Stir Crazy: Directed by Sidney Poitier. With Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams. Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0081562/","name":"Stir Crazy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFkM2NiYTktODYwOC00NmI5LTgyNmItYTYzZGU1ZTJiN2E5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU4Nzk4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081562/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend","dateCreated":"2011-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A hundred and twenty five years... Oh God, Oh God... Ill be a hundred and sixty one when I get out.","reviewBody":"Stir Crazy is directed by Sidney Poitier and written by Bruce Jay Friedman. It stars Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Miguel Angel Suarez, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams and Erland Van Lidth. Plot has Pryor and Wilder as two care free New York buddies who after getting fired from their jobs decide to make their way to Hollywood in search of better fortunes. However, after taking up a gig as promotional woodpeckers for a bank's advertisement drive, they find themselves framed for robbing the bank and sentenced to 125 years each in prison ..

The second pairing of Wilder and Pryor proves to be the best of their output on film. With their chemistry skin tight, film is full of laughs until a big slow down for the last third when the inevitable attempt at a prison break out occurs. Poitier's direction isn't up to anything other than correctly letting his two lead stars strut their stuff. But along with writer Friedman, he has to be accountable for letting the comedy dry up as the film chooses tension over humour which undoubtedly doesn't sit at all right. Still, the first hour is a joy ride, particularly once the guys land in prison, here the comedy reaches its peak and the contrast of the two characters played by Wilder and Pryor really mines the set-up for all is worth. Wilder is oblivious to the hazards of prison life, Pryor is street savvy and fully aware of the perils around every brick walled corner.

Naturally there's a hope on the horizon, which here comes in the form of Rodeo skills, this too brings the laughs, as does the number of prison characters that join in the plot. Notably Van Lidth's monstrous, and monstrously funny, Grossberger. Yes it's a roll call of prison stereotypes, from the top where the morally dubious Warden (Barry Corbin) sits, down to the cons where gays, bullies and gate happy loonies reside. With that, some of it now seems twee and badly out of date. So much so it's a film that is unlikely to garner a new and appreciative audience. However, those who were enamoured and found themselves laughing heartily with it back in the early 80s, should find that like myself, it holds up real well. Kind of like an old friend you call on when you need a pick me up. Hardly a superior comedy classic, then, but a film that rewards its fans on each subsequent revisit. 7/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1980-12-12","keywords":"prison,prison yard,cell mate,woodpecker costume,jail","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stir Crazy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi910212889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000698/","name":"Gene Wilder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001640/","name":"Richard Pryor","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113617/","name":"Georg Stanford Brown"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001627/","name":"Sidney Poitier"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295171/","name":"Bruce Jay Friedman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085883/","name":"Charles Blackwell"],"duration":"PT1H51M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:

A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0252076/","name":"Maid in Manhattan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczODg2ODI2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODIxMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0252076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mis_Behavin"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly OK","reviewBody":"I actually thought this film wasn't bad. It wasn't a masterpiece, but then again I don't think it ever had aspirations to be.

J-Lo does a good job to pull off her role nicely - although in the beginning I couldn't help but think 'Oh look - it's Jennifer Lopez, prime diva, pretending to be poor'.

Even more amazingly is that Mr Pretentious - step forward Ralph 'it's pronounced Rafe' Fiennes - does a good job in making his role believable.

With a good supporting cast this film trundles along nicely. It's never going to change your life but not bad for whiling away a boring afternoon if you've nothing better to do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87247,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-03-26","keywords":"brooklyn new york city,ball gown,watching tv,1970s,caught naked","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Maid in Manhattan","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3935764761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0MmM2ZDgtMzg3YS00NzNiLWIxZGEtNzg3ODUzZmZmMTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0MmM2ZDgtMzg3YS00NzNiLWIxZGEtNzg3ODUzZmZmMTcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000182/","name":"Jennifer Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001670/","name":"Natasha Richardson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911061/","name":"Wayne Wang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087432/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073707/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000455/","name":"John Hughes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Erin Brockovich: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Julia Roberts, David Brisbin, Dawn Didawick, Albert Finney. An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0195685/","name":"Erin Brockovich","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA1NWRkNTktNDMxNS00NjE4LWEzMDAtNzA3YzlhYzRhNDA4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0195685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"styrrell"},"dateCreated":"2001-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Truth IS Stranger Than Fiction","reviewBody":"If I didn't know it was based on a "true" story I might have dismissed this movie as "unrealistic", particularly in the first half hour or so when it started off like another Julia Roberts comedy. At the beginning the film appears to focus primarily on her wardrobe, her foul language, and the developing romance with the "boy next door", whom she initially dislikes. As it turns out, the actual story, according to the bonus features on the DVD was even more melodramatic than the film's. The real Erin actually got sick to the point of hospitalization from the chromium in Hinkley. The director wisely decided to cut out this part of the story, to avoid making her too much of a martyr. Another aspect while not totally ignored (she does mention at least once that she's a "slow reader") but underplayed is Erin's dyslexia. This makes her accomplishments all the more amazing! Personally, I think this fact could have been emphasized more, as no doubt it was a big factor behind her "attitude" problems - her combativeness toward people with more education than herself, her struggles in finding a job, perhaps even in her efforts to accentuate her physical attractiveness through her outrageous clothing. All in all I found it an enjoyable and enlightening story - the triumph of a unique individual whose determination, empathy, and sense of moral duty ultimately outweigh her abrasiveness and lack of social graces. And largely why she triumphs is her partnership with an intelligent and decent lawyer in Ed Masry. What a refreshing departure from the usual Hollywood stereotype! On many occasions, he effectively counters Erin's prejudices with rational explanations how and why the legal system works the way it does, and why lawyers behave the way they do. With her passion and his reason, they make a great team. Now if only the movie hadn't fallen into the old Hollywood trap of giving its leading lady more outfits than is realistic for someone of her economic status. The point that Erin dressed provocatively and this caused problems with her co-workers could have easily been made with just 3 or 4 costumes. Other than that, it was a good movie - great performances and a wonderful story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-03-17","keywords":"environmental issue,contamination,corporate crime,single mother,contaminated water","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi440712729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRhNjI2NjEtZTdhMi00ZDkxLWI4MjYtMWU2ODU0MzExMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRhNjI2NjEtZTdhMi00ZDkxLWI4MjYtMWU2ODU0MzExMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0109773/","name":"David Brisbin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010434/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0335666/","name":"Susannah Grant"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Extinction
Extinction
programme.desc:
Extinction: Directed by Miguel Ángel Vivas. With Matthew Fox, Jeffrey Donovan, Quinn McColgan, Clara Lago. And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3467412/","name":"Extinction","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzMzIyMTQ3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMzNTAwNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3467412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johnny-bev"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sub-Zero Horror!... At Its Best!","reviewBody":"Well all I can say is what a pleasant surprise, just when I was looking for something that would fly under the radar this popped up!,in a world populated by c grade trash and Hollywood tripe movies this is the sort of film genuine horror fans will enjoy, although a little of a slow burner its apocalyptic arctic setting builds to a climatic yet somewhat satisfying but logical end without overstepping the overall mark.

Not a huge lot of replay value to be truthful but horror fans will enjoy it every now and then in the right setting as I will, well acted...well pretty much everything was done to above a good standard to be truthful and this will join my collection among many other from the same genre.

ps....not a real zombie film but something much more."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-07-31","keywords":"father daughter relationship,zombie apocalypse,zombie,epidemic,post apocalypse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Extinction","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1221702425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDIwZjE2MTgtNTMyNC00NGNjLWJmMWUtZTIxNzg0OTA3MDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDIwZjE2MTgtNTMyNC00NGNjLWJmMWUtZTIxNzg0OTA3MDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Extinction"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289142/","name":"Matthew Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232998/","name":"Jeffrey Donovan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3824412/","name":"Quinn McColgan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0900251/","name":"Miguel Ángel Vivas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123200/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320014/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157609/","name":"Alberto Marini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0900251/","name":"Miguel Ángel Vivas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5363153/","name":"Juan de Dios Garduño"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

At Its Best!","reviewBody":"Well all I can say is what a pleasant surprise, just when I was looking for something that would fly under the radar this popped up!,in a world populated by c grade trash and Hollywood tripe movies this is the sort of film genuine horror fans will enjoy, although a little of a slow burner its apocalyptic arctic setting builds to a climatic yet somewhat satisfying but logical end without overstepping the overall mark.

Not a huge lot of replay value to be truthful but horror fans will enjoy it every now and then in the right setting as I will, well acted...well pretty much everything was done to above a good standard to be truthful and this will join my collection among many other from the same genre.

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Mercedes Mason, Melissa O'Neil, Afton Williamson, Eric Winter

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom... Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: Dobri liječnik
programme.desc: Dok se dr. Andrews bavi Zavodom za javno zdravstvo koji istražuje njegovu reakciju na pojavu virusa u bolnici St. Bonaventure, Shaun i osoblje počinju se oporavljati. Lea pritišće Shauna da uzme... Dok se dr. Andrews bavi Zavodom za javno zdravstvo koji istražuje njegovu reakciju na pojavu virusa u bolnici St. Bonaventure, Shaun i osoblje počinju se oporavljati. Lea pritišće Shauna da uzme slobodan dan, a Morgan nenadano poziva Claire na brunch. Melendez prati Limin oporavak te razgovaraju o budućnosti svoje veze. Zahvaljujući karanteni Park i bivša supruga Mia opet su počeli razgovarati, a Shaun potiče Glassmana da što prije opet krene na kemoterapije. U međuvremenu istražitelj otkriva nekoliko upitnih odluka koje je Andrews donio za vrijeme karantene. Iako zbog napetosti među njima brunch loše započne, Morgan se ne libi krenuti s Claire kad je mama nazove da joj pomogne jer su je izbacili iz stana. Kad pronađe dokaze da se Breeze seli da bi pobjegla od nasilnog dečka, Morgan angažira Claire da joj pomogne suočiti se s njim, no saznaje da Breeze odlazi da bi izbjegla bračnu ponudu. Lea ustraje da se ručak u uredu pretvori u zabavan izlazak pa Glassman mora propitati svoju reakciju na bolest. Kad je Park zamoli da pruži braku još jednu priliku, Mia kaže da želi krenuti dalje. Ali na putu u zračnu luku predomisli se i odluči provesti još jedan dan s Parkom i sinom Kellanom. Kad pitaju Breeze zašto je pobjegla, Claire i Morgan uvide da unatoč suparništvu na poslu imaju razloga biti prijateljice. Dok prijetnja sankcijama prisiljava Andrewsa da brani postupke svog tima u trenucima krize, Melendez i Lim dogovaraju da će se i dalje viđati potajno. Na kraju Mia pristaje pružiti braku još jednu priliku, a Shaun se uzruja kad sazna da Lea možda ima dečka.

A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. IMDb data; ttnr: 0455362, Title: The Breed, --- Description: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse","dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rjtyler-23638"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what you would expect from an military show","reviewBody":"When I first saw this, i took it to be a typical wave the flag, the American Military is here to save the day show. And in some aspects it is that, but it is also so much more.

This is a deep dive into the physiological impacts of war, terrorism and how people cope with the high pressure costs, not only on the battlefield, but on their mental stability, and physical make up.

This is not you typical military drama and is well worth the watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118568/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.
