programme.title: Alien³
Alien 3
programme.desc: Alien³: Directed by David Fincher. With Sigourney Weaver, Charles S. Dutton, Charles Dance, Paul McGann. After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103644/","name":"Alien³","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNiYmQzNTctNzAyZC00ODY2LWE3ZjgtODU1NDA0NGI5ZDY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103644/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"revival05"},"dateCreated":"2000-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not very good.","reviewBody":"**Sorry for some spelling-misstakes** This is the worst Alien-movie. Fincher tries to mix the dark feeling in the first movie with the 100 % action of ''Aliens''. I'm sorry Dave, it's simply doesn't work. OK, OK. I can admit it. It is entertaining at some points, but it is just because ''Alien 3'' is more of a copy of the other movies. Now, whats wrong with that picture? Everything is stolen from the other movies and you don't feel as amused of anything any more. The actors was really, really good but that can't save the bad script and the direction. I ( as a pure movielover ) will forever be gratefull for Fincher's job with ''Se7en''. This is though not one of his better movies."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":290004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1992-10-12","keywords":"alien,prison,android,cryogenics,cult film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Alien 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1520474905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3YTkyM2ItY2UzOC00Mzg4LWEzNjItNWEwM2VjY2RmNDlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3YTkyM2ItY2UzOC00Mzg4LWEzNjItNWEwM2VjY2RmNDlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 10 for Alien 3"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001165/","name":"Charles S. programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
Pravna plavuša 2
programme.desc:
Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde: Directed by Charles Herman-Wurmfeld. With Reese Witherspoon, Sally Field, Regina King, Jennifer Coolidge. Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0333780/","name":"Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzExMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTUzNDcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0333780/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"3-D"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not good at all.","reviewBody":"Although I recognize the fact that I'm a guy and shouldn't like chick flicks anyway, Legally Blonde 2 was ridiculous on so many levels that after watching the movie I had to lower my head in shame.

The first LB movie, while not very funny, was still entertaining to watch because it actually had effort put into the storyline. It was interesting to see a fashion-obsessed blonde in pink apparently not fitting in at Harvard law school. They tried the same approach with LB2, only with her walking into congress buildings wearing her all pink outfits. However, since we've already seen that attempt at humor in the first movie, it just wasn't anything special.

Aside from that, the plot outline was horrible. Basically, Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is having an upcoming wedding where she plans to invite the mother of her pet dog. She discovers that the dog's mother is in a lab, where they were testing fingernail polish on the dog's nails. Elle got sad and was like 'I am going to go to DC and make it illegal for them to test on animals!' The viewer, however, doesn't really care, realizing that putting nail polish on a dog's nails really isn't that big of a deal, but hey.

I'm not trying to sound mean, but I just can't really think of anything good about this movie. Every single joke used in the movie was either not funny or recycled from the first one. The entire concept of the plot is just retarded. It even seemed Reese was half-assing her acting job through the movie, doing even worse than she did in the first film. Nobody else in the movie will be nominated for any Oscars, either.

It just seemed that some filmmaker wanted to cash in from the first movie's success, knowing that people will pay money to see this movie just because the first one was popular. All of the production team's effort went into marketing and hype and they just didn't put enough into the actual movie itself.

2 out of 10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-17","keywords":"congresswoman,transvestism,the white house,washington monument washington d.c.,naivete","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2581971225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379237/","name":"Charles Herman-Wurmfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113005/","name":"Amanda Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0013996/","name":"Eve Ahlert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0236881/","name":"Dennis Drake"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0290095/","name":"The Tuxedo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyNTI0NjM5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjQ0NTE3._V1_.jpg","description":"A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0290095/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TDE156"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"stupid idea, stupid movie","reviewBody":"I think Jackie Chan movies are cool. They have great action with humor, and normally a good plot. This movie is a disappointment. It didn't have enough action, badly scripted humor, and the plot is beyond stupid.The concept of Jackie Chan being a tuxedo-clad super hero is silly and wierd. The idea of the villain poisoning the town's water supply with water striders is lame. Also, if I have to listen to Jackie Chan's rude partner(Jinnifer Love Hewett) complain,I'm going to scream.She was very pretty, but not likeable at all.When I was watching this movie, I felt like Jackie falling off that water tower. Very painful to watch.\n\nhalf a star out of five"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-01-08","keywords":"boxer shorts,slimehouse,molecule,tuxedo,chauffeur","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001349/","name":"Jennifer Love Hewitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005042/","name":"Jason Isaacs"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1019493/","name":"Kevin Donovan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072233/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006534/","name":"Phil Hay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542062/","name":"Matt Manfredi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. So if you ignored all that & watched with your kids, then that's on you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9474,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2019-12-19","keywords":"christmas eve,tv mini series,classic story,london england,based on novella","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334318/","name":"Stephen Graham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0432343/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0216537/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2362097433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAzYWI3NzMtMTkyNy00NTEwLTlmNmItZTJkMzIyZDhkODkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAzYWI3NzMtMTkyNy00NTEwLTlmNmItZTJkMzIyZDhkODkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A spine-tingling immersion into Ebenezer Scrooge's dark night of the soul."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
Lov na Crveni oktobar
programme.desc: The Hunt for Red October: Directed by John McTiernan. With Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn, Sam Neill. In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain, in a new undetectable sub, violates orders and heads for the U.S. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099810/","name":"The Hunt for Red October","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdkODg3YzctMGVmZS00ZDM5LWIzNTctZDRlMjA5Mjc4MGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain, in a new undetectable sub, violates orders and heads for the U.S. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099810/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"happywaffle"},"dateCreated":"2003-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The last good movie Connery and Alec ever made.","reviewBody":"I know I talk about them like they're dead, but seriously - each actor gave a tour de force performance in this film and then lost his respective ability to pick scripts. Alec was by far the best Jack Ryan with his affable persona - Harrison was dull dull dull, and Ben Affleck was just a little too frat-boy. The screenwriter took an excellent 500-page book and almost miraculously condensed it into a coherent two-hour story that was just as taut. programme.title: Alien: Resurrection
Alien: Uskrsnuće
programme.desc:
Alien: Resurrection: Directed by Jean-Pierre Jeunet. With Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder, Dominique Pinon, Ron Perlman. 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118583/","name":"Alien: Resurrection","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDljNGZkNmItNDlmMi00YzJhLWJiYWUtNGY4OGEwNmY0ODg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mr-altex"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Many flaws, yet so many memorable moments","reviewBody":"It is strange, that movie this bad is so memorable and awesome :D

Every other line of script consists loud shouting with close up so the head takes at least 60% of the screen. It is maybe the reason this movie is a walking meme.

It's a horror movie that has given horror theme and basically there are no surprises. You can surprise somebody from behind only couple of times before it gets old. Sometimes the one walking up front gets it, sometimes the one guardian the rear. And this movie does this kinda well, it plays it for its audience.

I liked it. Even back then, still even now. After seeing Alien 2 as a kid, i had nightmares as it was seriously scary movie. But then the A3 + this cured me forever as it does not take itself that seriously. On one hand it's a shame, but on the other hand it's good to have some different take on the same universe.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239573,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1998-10-10","keywords":"pregnant alien,alien,strong female lead,strong female character,lesbian subtext","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Alien: Resurrection","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1570806553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0OGJkNWMtNTczOS00OTJlLWExZDAtMGZkOTgwYWRjZjk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0OGJkNWMtNTczOS00OTJlLWExZDAtMGZkOTgwYWRjZjk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 3 for Alien: Resurrection"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684500/","name":"Dominique Pinon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000466/","name":"Jean-Pierre Jeunet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132161/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923736/","name":"Joss Whedon"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Out of sight
programme.desc: George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez. Kandidat për dy çmime Oskar. Një grabitës bankash që sapo është arratisur nga burgu, ka në plan të kryejë një 'punë' të madhe, por romanca e filluar me një agjente federale do të rrezikojë gjithçka.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Unë jam Hakmarrja
programme.desc: 2020. Për të pastruar dosjen e tij kriminale, një ish ushtar i forcave speciale pranon të drejtojë një ekip special për të kapur një mercenar tradhtar dhe ta dorëzojë atë para drejtësisë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: I miri, i keqi dhe i vdekuri
programme.desc: Johnny Messner, Dolph Lundgren, Danny Trejo. Pasi Brajan Barns zgjohet në shkretëtirë pa mbajtur mend asgjë, me 4 milionë dollarë dhe viktima që e rrethojnë, ai zbulon se po ndiqet nga një bos i drogës, DEA dhe një sherif i korruptuar.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Linja
programme.desc: Ray Liotta, Esai Morales, Andy Garcia, Armand Assante. Një vrasës me pagesë, merr përsipër të eliminojë drejtuesin e një organizate që shpërndan drogë, por njohja me një grua të re dhe vajzën e saj do të komplikojë gjithçka.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Silverado
programme.desc: Kevin Kline, Scott Glenn, Kevin Costner, Danny Glover. Kandidat për 2 çmime Oskar. Katër miq, vendosin të bashkojnë forcat dhe të vënë rregull në një qytezë të mbizotëruar nga korrupsioni dhe krimi...
programme.category: Western Night

programme.title: Ndërmjetësi
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson, Kevin Spacey. Një negociator pengjesh detyrohet të kthehet vetë në një marres pengjesh, pasi dikush i ngre kurth duke e bërë të dyshuarin kryesor për vrasjen e partnerit të tij.
programme.category: Thriller
aksion

programme.title: Gracka kohore
programme.desc: 2017. Një grup studentësh bllokohen në një shpellë misterioze ndërsa kërkojnë profesorin e zhdukur të arkeologjisë. Edhe pse pa asnjë shpresë shpëtimi, përpjeka për një rrugëdalje, i çon ata të zbulojnë legjendën më të lakmuar në histori...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Star Trek 1
programme.desc: Një racë jashtëtokësore, që shkatërron gjithçka që del përpara i është drejtuar tokës. Kapiteni Kirk dhe ekuipazhi i anijes 'Enterprise', do të nisin një mision të rrezikshëm për t'i ndalur para se ata të zhdukin botën tonë.
programme.category: Fantashkence

programme.title: Katër Fantastikët
programme.desc: Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans. Pas një rrezatimi kozmik, katër astronautë fitojnë aftësi të jashtëzakonshme dhe i kundërvihen një kolegu gjithashtu të prekur nga rrezatimi, që aftësitë kërkon t'i përdorë për qëllime djallëzore.
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Shumë vështirë për të vrarë
programme.desc: Steven Seagal, Jade Ewen. Një ish-agjent i DEA-s, pranon të ndihmojë një grua misterioze dhe joshëse, për të grabitur 2 milione dollarë nga një kriminel i rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Will Smith, Charlize Theron, Jason Bateman. Një superhero i harruar dhe i përbuzur nga shoqëria, krijon një lidhje të mistershme me gruan e agjentit që ka marrë përsipër të rimëkëmbë reputacionin e tij.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Rrëmbimi i Pelham 123
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, John Travolta. Një dispeçer metroje në Nju Jork, përdor njohuritë e tij, për të ndaluar katër kriminelë, të cilët kanë marrë peng një tren dhe kërcënojnë se vrasjen e njeriu për çdo orë që nuk u paguhet shuma e kërkuar.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Arratisje nga Dankirku
programme.desc: Në Francën e pushtuar nga nazistët, një kampion boksi i kapur rob, detyrohet të luftojë me një kundërshtar gjerman po aq të fortë, për të argëtuar pushtuesit. Për të dhe shokët e tij, kjo mund të shndërrohet në mundësinë e vetme për një arratisje të guxim.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Dëmi
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Lynda Boyd. Një ish i burgosur, detyrohet të futet në botën e arteve marciale për të siguruar jetesën. Ai mundohet të futet në rrugë të drejtë dhe me ndihmën e dy asistentëve të tij shpejt arrin majat e suksesit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Detektivi Di dhe misteri i Flakes
programme.desc: Në Kinën e lashtë, disa vdekje misterioze rrezikojnë kurorëzimin e perandoreshës. Tani për të zgjidhur misterin, edhe pse e ka burgosur e persekutuar, ajo do t'ja ngarkojë çështjen detektivit më të mirë...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Sulmi
programme.desc: Vincent Elbaz, Grégori Derangère. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të sulmit që kryen forcat speciale franceze, për të neutralizuar terroristët që moren peng një avion në vitin 1994.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mbreti akrep III
programme.desc: Victor Webster, Ron Perlman, Billy Zane. Tashmë Mathaius, i ka humbur tokat e tij dhe për t'i rimarrë, ai do të ndihmojë një mbret, i cili është në luftë me të vëllain dhe ushtrinë e tij djallëzore...
programme.category: Beteja finale

programme.title: Në kërkim të gurit të çmuar
programme.desc: M.Douglas, K.Turner. Një hartë thesari i shkon me postë një romanciereje e cila e merr me vete në Kolumbi në përpjekje për të shpëtuar motrën e marrë peng. Atje takon një gjuetar thesaresh dhe të dy do të nisin një aventurë.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Sunshine cleaning
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Amy Adams, Emily Blunt, Alan Arkin, etj. E vendosur për të dërguar djalin e saj në një shkollë private, një nënë beqare bashkë me motrën, hapin një biznes për të pastruar skenat e krimit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Romantikët
programme.desc: Katie Holmes, Josh Duhamel, Anna Paquin. Rivalitete të vjetra do të rishfaqen në prag të dasmës së një vajze, e cila do të martohet me ish të dashurin e shoqërueses së saj.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Z. Askushi
programme.desc: Jared Leto, Sarah Polley, Diane Kruger. Në vitin 2092, një njeri 118 vjeçar i tregon jetën e tij një reporteri, duke u fokusuar në 3 momente vendimtare dhe rrugët e ndryshme që ai mund të kishte zgjedhur.
programme.category: Dramë romantike
fantazi

programme.title: Mbahu tek Piti
programme.desc: Chloë Sevigny, Steve Buscemi, Charlie Plummer. 15-vjeçari Çarli punon në një pistë garash për kuaj. Kur mëson se kali për të cilin kujdeset nuk garon dot më, ndaj do theret, ai merr masa ekstreme për t'i shpëtuar jetën mikut të tij të ri.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në rini
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Naomi Watts. Ndërkohë që përballen me ndryshimet që vijnë me moshën e mesme, jeta dhe karriera e një producenti dokumentarësh dhe gruas së tij, do të ripërtërihet nga takimi me një çift rreth të 25-ave...
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Ndërsa jemi këtu
programme.desc: Kate Bosworth. Shkrimtarja Xhejn shoqëron bashkëshortin muzikant për një koncert në Napoli, me shpresën se ky udhëtimi do ta ndihmojë martesën e tyre të trazuar. Por atje do të provojë një tjetër romancë, më një djalë më të ri se ajo.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: 1 Javë për të ndryshuar
programme.desc: J.Bateman, O.Wilde. I dëbuar nga hoteli luksoz ku jeton, një 40 vjeçar detyrohet të shkojë të jetojë me shokun e tij më të mirë. Gjithçka shkon mirë, derisa ai bie në dashuri me të dashurën e shokut dhe fillon një trekëndësh dashurie...
programme.category: Romance

programme.title: Botë të rriturish
programme.desc: Emma Roberts, John Cusack. Një vajzë që sapo ka mbaruar universitetin dhe beson se do të bëhet poete e famshme, pranon të punojë në një dyqan erotik ndërkohë që përpiqet t'i mbushë mendjen shkrimtarit të preferuar që ta marrë nën kujdes.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Brenda dhimbjes
programme.desc: Olivia Wilde, Luke Wilson. Një vit pas rrëmbimit të djalit të tyre, një polic dhe gruaja e tij sa vijnë e zhyten më shumë në dhimbjen dhe ndjenjën e fajësisë që i ka pushtuar...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ç'të pret kur pret një fëmijë
programme.desc: Elizabeth Banks, Jennifer Lopez, Brooklyn Decker, Cameron Diaz, Dennis Quaid. Pesë çifte, jetët e të cilëve janë të ndërthurura me njëra tjetrën, përjetojnë në mënyra të ndryshme gëzimet dhe ndryshimet e sjelljes në jetë të një fëmije...
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Një romancë në Paris
programme.desc: Isabella, bën hapin e madh dhe hyn në një konkurs prestigjioz të verës në Paris. Mes pijeve, ushqimit të mirë, dhe .... njohjeve të reja, ajo mund të fitojë më shumë se një trofe...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Betimi
programme.desc: 2012. Channing Tatum, Rachel McAdams. Një çift i sapo martuar pëson një aksident me makinë dhe gruaja humbet kujtesën, duke mos mbajtur mend as bashkëshortin. I gatshëm të bëjë gjithçka, ai përpiqet të fitojë sërish zemrën e saj...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Vera e jetës sime
programme.desc: Liam James, Steve Carell. Ndërkohë që detyrohet të shkoje me pushime me nënën e tij dhe të dashurin e saj, një 14 vjeçar miqësohet me një punonjës në një park ujor. Ai, do ti mësojë djalit, sesi të notojë përmes sfidave të jetës...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Baroni i druvarëve
programme.desc: Në një kohë kur tregtia e drurit ishte një industri në lulëzim, një burrë kthehet në shtëpi për të shpëtuar biznesin e lakmuar të familjes, të zbulojë me tepër për vdekjen e papritur të babait të tij dhe të shmangë rrënimin financiar.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në vendin tënd
programme.desc: Amandla Stenberg. Historia e dashurisë mes një adoleshenteje me racë mikse dhe nje anëtari të organizatës 'Të rinjtë e Hitlerit' dhe përpjekja e tyre për të mbijetuar në gjermaninë naziste...
programme.category: Dramë
romancë
luftë

programme.title: Zhdukja e Sidni Hollit
programme.desc: Logan Lerman. Pas famës së papritur falë romanit të tij, bazuar në vdekjën e një prej shokëve të gjimnazit, shkrimtari Sidni Holl zhduket. Një dekadë më vonë, një detektiv nis ta kërkojë, sepse librat e tij lidhen me një varg zjarrvëniesh...
programme.category: Dramë
Mister

programme.title: Çdo ditë ndryshe
programme.desc: Një 16-vjeçare dashurohet më një shpirt misterioz i cili zgjohet çdo ditë në një trup të ndryshëm. Duke ndjerë një lidhje të pashoqe, ata përpiqen përditë të gjejnë njëri-tjetrin...
programme.category: Dramë
fantazi
romancë

programme.title: Kasollja
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin bestseller të New York Times. Pas një tragjedie familjare, një njeri merr një letër misterioze që e fton të vizitojë një kasolle. Atje takon 3 të panjohur, të cilët e ndihmojnë të kuptojë më mirë dhimbjen e tij.
programme.category: Dramë
fantazi

programme.title: Dasmori
programme.desc: Dev Patel. Një burrë misterioz britanik me një axhendë sekrete udhëton drejt Pakistanit për të marrë pjesë në një dasmë, por gjërat marrin një kthesë të papritur dhe të rrezikshme kur planet e tij fillojnë të zbulohen.
programme.category: Thriller
aksion

programme.title: Ritëm i përsosur 3
programme.desc: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson. Të ndara pas fitores së tyre në kampionatin botëror, kori i vajzave Bella, ribashkohet për një garë të fundit, por përballet me një grup shumë të fortë që përdor instrumentet dhe zërin.
programme.category: Muzikë
komedi

programme.title: Rrëmbyer nga stuhia
programme.desc: Shailene Woodley, Sam Claflin. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë mbijetese. Një çift i ri ndërmerr aventurën e jetës duke kaluar oqeanin me varkë, por nuk mund të imagjinonin se do lundronin drejt një prej uraganëve më katastrofikë të historisë...
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Komb i robëruar
programme.desc: Me John Goodman. Një forcë jashtëtokësore ka pushtuar Tokën, duke mashtruar njerëzimin me premtimin për paqe dhe unitet. Një djalë i ri vihet përballë zgjedhjes së vështirë për bashkëpunim, ose kundërshtim.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Enola Holms
programme.desc: Bazuar në serinë e librave për adoleshentë. Londër, Epoka Viktoriane. Në mëngjesin e 16-vjetorit, Enola, motra adoleshente e Sherlock Holmsit, zbulon se nëna e saj është zhdukur. Kundër udhëzimeve të vëllezërve, ajo vihet në kërkim të saj.
programme.category: Mister
aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Familjari
programme.desc: Dane Jensen (Gerard Butler) është një njeri në karrierë, shumë i suksesshëm dhe po lufton që të bëhet drejtori i kompanisë ku punon dhe kalon shumicën e kohës. Por kur djali i tij 10-vjeçar, diagnostikohet me leuçemi, Dane do të rivlerësojë prioritetet d.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Engjëlli i hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner. Pesë vjet pasi burri dhe e bija vriten nga një sulm i pakuptimtë, nje grua e kthen dhimbjen në forcë për t'u hakmarrë ndaj përgjegjësve dhe ndaj sistemit që i la kriminelët e lirë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Shpejtësi dhe çmenduri: Hobsi
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, Helen Mirren. Agjenti Luk Hobs dhe mercenari Dekard Shou formojnë një aleancë të pazakontë kur një terrorist i modifikuar gjenetikisht kërcënon të ardhmen e njerëzimit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion

programme.title: Xheku dhe Xhilli
programme.desc: Jeta e një biznesmeni (Adam Sandler) të suksesshëm e të lumtur kthehet në një kaos të pashmangshëm, kur motra e tij binjake (gjithashtu Adam Sandler), por shumë ndryshe nga ai vjen për vizitën e përvitshme të festës së Falenderimeve.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Detektivi Mindhorn
programme.desc: Një aktori të rënë nga lavdia, i jepet mundësia të rigjallërojë karrieren e tij, kur një kriminel psikopat beson se personazhi i tij është real dhe kërkon të flasë vetëm me të.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Udhëtim me një rok star
programme.desc: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand. Një asistent i ri i një kompanie muzikore dërgohet në Londër, për të bindur një legjendë roku të shthurur, që të japë koncert në Los Anxhelos...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: U diplomova...Po tani?
programme.desc: Alexis Bledel, Zach Gilford, Jane Lynch. Një vajzë e sapo diplomuar, detyrohet të rikthehet në shtëpi dhe të jetojë me nënën e saj, ndërkohë që përpiqet të gjejë një punë, njeriun dhe rrugën e duhur në jetë...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Mafia
programme.desc: Jay Mohr, Christina Applegate, Lloyd Bridges. Parodi e sagës 'Kumbari'. Djali i një mafiozi që erdhi nga hiçi merr në dorë 'biznesin' e familjes, sigurisht me situata nga më qesharaket.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Meshkujt kundër femrave
programme.desc: Paola Cortellesi, Fabio De Luigi, Sarah Felberbaum, Chiara Francini, Lucia Ocone. Një sërë ngjarjesh që ndërthuren me njëra tjetrën, në 'luftën' e përjetshme mes meshkujve dhe femrave...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Si të bësh para pa punuar
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg. Ajo është një agjente e aftë burse. Përballë refuzimit të radhës për ngritje në detyrë, ajo vendos të braktisë punën dhe të hyjë në biznes me klientët në emër të një partneri imagjinar, Z.Robert Kati duke patur sukses.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bodyguards: Truprojat
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo. Pasi pushohen nga puna për paaftësinë e tyre, tre policë vendosin të fillojnë punë si truproja. Por edhe në këtë profesion, telashet dhe keqkuptimet nuk do t'ju ndahen...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Më pëlqen ky ritëm
programme.desc: Parodi e filmave: Ruaje vallëzimin e fundit, Një hap, Djemtë që tundin pistën, Fama.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Spanglisht
programme.desc: A.Sandler, T.Leoni. Flor mbërrin bashkë me të bijën nga Meksika në SHBA për një jetë me të mirë. Takon kuzhinierin Klaski, një shef me nam që e punëson në shtëpinë e tij. Por, si të merret vesh për të thënë ato që do?
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Krishtlindje plot dashuri
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Sabrina Ferilli, Massimo Boldi, Danny De Vito. Tre çifte shumë të ndryshëm nga njëri tjetri, rastësisht takohen në të njëjtin vend ku po festojnë Krishtlindjen. Një takim plot ngatërresa, të qeshura dhe. plot dashuri.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Makina lufte
programme.desc: Brad Pitt, Ben Kingsley. Kur një gjeneral krenar ngarkohet të përfundojë me qetësi një luftë 8-vjeçare që nuk gëzon përkrahje popullore, ai vendos të bëjë mision të tij fitimin e luftës, por nuk dyshon se mendjemadhësia mund të jetë armiku i tij më i keq.
programme.category: Komedi
luftë

programme.title: Super krishtlindjet Italiane
programme.desc: Një film që përmbledh skenat më gazmore të komedive italiane për krishtlindje ndër vite, me interpretuesit kryesorë: Massimo Boldi, Christian De Sica, Sabrina Ferilli, Claudio Bisio etj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mos shiko pas xhamit
programme.desc: Maria, një vajzë e ndrojtur dhe e izoluar, i rrëfehet vazhdimisht imazhit të saj në pasqyrë. Jeta e saj kthehet përmbys kur papritmas, këmben vendet me pasqyrimin e saj të lig...
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Nata e hënës së përgjakur
programme.desc: Dy grupe rivale njerëzish-ujq, një që jeton duke gjuajtur dhe vrarë dhe tjetri që jeton në paqe me shoqerinë, përballen për fatin e një 13-vjeçari, i cili ka në dorë përmbushjen e një profecie të lashtë dhe fatin e tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Kandidati Mançurian
programme.desc: D.Uashington. Gjatë Luftës se I-re të Gjirit Persik, një skuader zihet në prite! Rreshteri Raymond i shpëton. Majori Ben Marko kish humbur ndjenjat. I pari bëhet hero dhe synon Presidencen, kurse i dyti dyshon për atë që ndodhi ne Irak.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Më vrit tri herë
programme.desc: Simon Pegg, Teresa Palmer, Alice Braga. Pasi dështon të eliminiojë një vajzë, një vrasës profesionist zbulon se ai nuk ishte i vetmi që e kishte shënjestruar dhe e gjen veten në tri histori vrasjeje, shantazhi dhe hakmarrjeje.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Alibi e përkryer
programme.desc: Plani i një gazetari të ri (Jesse Metcalfe), për të ekspozuar mashtrimet e prokurorit të përgjithshëm (Michael Douglas), merr një kthesë të rrezikshme që rrezikon t'i shkatërrojë gjithë jetën...
programme.category: Mister
krim

programme.title: Shtëpia prej xhami
programme.desc: D. Lane. L. Sobieski. Kur prindërit e Rubit vdesin në një aksident, ajo dhe i vëllai shkojnë të jetojnë me ish fqinjët e tyre. Në fillim gjithçka shkon mirë, por më pas sjellja e prindërve kujdestarë fillon të ndryshojë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Oliver Sherman
programme.desc: Garret Dillahunt, Molly Parker, Donal Logue. Një veteran i luftës i përndjekur nga e kaluara, vihet në kërkim të njeriut që gjatë një beteje i shpëtoi jetën...
programme.category: Thriller
luftë

programme.title: Telefonuesja
programme.desc: 2011. Rachelle Lefevre, Stephen Moyer, Luis Guzmán. Një vajzë që sapo është shpërngulur në një shtëpi të re për t'ju larguar jetës së mëparshme, përjeton një makth të tmerrshëm kur përpiqet t'i japë fund telefonatave të një gruaje misterioze.
programme.category: Mister

programme.title: Mirë se erdhe në të djeshmen
programme.desc: Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia. Një grup adoleshentësh zbulojnë planet për një makinë kohe dhe arrijnë ta ndërtojnë. Por shumë shpejt, gjërat fillojnë të dalin jashtë kontrollit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Hajdutët e shpresës
programme.desc: Tre fëmijë nga lagjet e varfra të Brazilit, marrin arratinë pasi në mbeturinat e qytetit gjejnë një portofol që provon korrupsionin e një politikani të pushtetshëm.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Lidhja e njerëzve të
programme.desc: Sean Connery. Në një botë të vjetër të epokës Viktoriane një gjahtar, një luftëtar, një vampir, një njeri i padukshëm, një i pavdekshëm, një spiun e një bishë bashkohen për të shpëtuar botën kur një i çmendur i kërcënon t'u hedhë vargonjtë e Apokalip.
programme.category: jashtëzakonshëm

programme.title: Oslo
Oslo
programme.desc: Oslo: Directed by Bartlett Sher. With Ruth Wilson, Andrew Scott, Karel Dobrý, Tobias Zilliacus. programme.title: Arrival
Dolazak
programme.desc: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. There was not a single moment I felt bored.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647859,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-11-11","keywords":"alien contact,linguistics,linguist,nonlinear timeline,based on short story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225807897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898288/","name":"Denis Villeneuve"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2104063/","name":"Eric Heisserer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5384213/","name":"Ted Chiang"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Star Is Born
Zvijezda je rođena
programme.desc: A Star Is Born: Directed by Bradley Cooper. With Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay. A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1517451/","name":"A Star Is Born","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE5ZmE3OGItNTdlNC00YmMxLWEzNjctYzAwOGQ5ODg0OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1517451/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"silvaback-13517"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"This old Marines thoughts","reviewBody":"I did not want to watch this movie but took my wife to see it, because we both saw the one with Kris Kristofferson and Barbra Streisand, growing up. The crowd was a lot older than we were(we are almost 50) it was the biggest screen they had at our theater and seats a lot but it was maybe half full on Sunday afternoon. Not one dry eye in the place, it had a great tempo and didn't drag on or have any lulls in the story. We were both very pleased and are still engaging in conversations about the movie. It's my opinion to highly recommend to everyone go out and watch a great movie and a heartfelt movie that redefines love in this time and age we live in. That is my two cents, hope you enjoy as much as we have.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359208,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"alcoholism,tinnitus,rising star,singer songwriter,singer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi94288665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744839/","name":"Eric Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3391497/","name":"Will Fetters"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gravity
Gravitacija
programme.desc:
Gravity: Directed by Alfonso Cuarón. With Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris, Orto Ignatiussen. Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1454468/","name":"Gravity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE5MzYwMzYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk4MTk0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1454468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"secondtake"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A stellar space film that is literally about space and vertigo and survival--fiction, but not science fiction","reviewBody":"Gravity (2013)

A ridiculously visual movie. The photography is astonishing. Astonishing. Add to that a story that never relents with suspense and emotional intensity and you have a remarkable movie.

The idea of being under constant stress, worrying for your main characters, should not be new if you know the director Alfonso Cuaron's previous major film, "Children without Men." And like that film, he works with his same cameraman, Emmanuel Lubezki, who has become a co-conspirator in his films. That's a good thing. This movie is a visual stunner. Yes, it has a lot of "effects" if you can call them that, but that have such visual coherence they remain logical and reasonable, even as they tip into the fabulous. It's an achievement.

Sandra Bullock is the main character here, even more than her co-lead George Clooney. And she's pretty amazing. You might think she doesn't get much room to stretch her abilities, trapped in space the whole time, but this is exactly where it shows how good she is. Even when she's talking to herself she makes it real, and moving, not a canned or cheesy sentimental or filler kind of moment. Clooney is also strong, playing the more experienced astronaut to a T, including his enduring calm in crisis.

Once you are done watching and leave the theater (or stand up from your couch) you might actually feel disoriented. Certainly in 3-D (and I saw it in the IMAX version) the effects are visceral. But looking back in the light of day you might also ask what the movie was about. Or rather, if it was about anything more than the one, relentless trajectory of surviving a series of near-death mishaps.

The answer is no. And that's a strength. It's definitely good that the writers (including the director) did not push the sentimentality too hard (there's a little). And there is no great sense of finding God or discovering your inner self. No, this is a survival film as gripping and down to earth (haha) as the vivid "Grey." No distractions here.

Except the visuals. Even in 2-D this must be something to marvel at. The 3-D was really really good, and this might seem odd to say given the theatrical mechanics of the camera and exploding spacecraft, but it's also really subtle. There are few moments (memorable ones, like Bullock's tears) where the dimensional aspects come forward. But the film basically uses the 3-D effects to enhance what is already there, nothing more. This of course, enhances a lot, but in respect to the story.

The photography is remarkable for the long takes at work, including the almost laugh- out-loud spectacular first long scene where Bullock and Clooney are doing spacewalks. The intelligence of how the camera pulls you into the scenes, with fluidity and without breaks (no edits, no cuts), is both beautiful and effective. There are even moments that are so virtuosic you wonder how they even thought they could do it, let alone then do and succeed. 

The best example for me was watching Bullock spinning against the fixed starry sky, then the camera pulls closer and seamlessly starts to spin until the spinning becomes the same as Bullock's. The camera continues its approach, getting in on her helmet with reflections, and her face, and then finally her eye (yes that close), and with an incredibly deft wide angle swing we are in her head, looking out at the spinning universe, listening to her panic. Then the camera reverses and undoes all of this, step by fluid step. It takes a really long time, it happens without a single break (which means you are given no emotional escape), and it's both gorgeous and taut with terror. 

There have been some questions raised about the feasibility of the various events--the different orbits of the real shuttle and space station, or the high speed of the spacewalker in a jetpack, or getting a visual on a space station 100 miles away--but you have to just let all that go. It doesn't really matter. It's not about likelihood on any level. And the movie is so accurate in so many ways it will seem very conceivable. 

It's hard to imagine not liking this movie on one level or another. No, it isn't crazily imaginative like a Tarantino or Coen film, and it doesn't work its way into social or psychological significance, but what it deliberately does focus on is flawless.

a postscript: be sure to see the Cuaron directed parallel short film "Aningaaq" which is recently posted all over. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0164586/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190861/","name":"Jonás Cuarón"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
Lego Ninjago film
programme.desc:
The Lego Batman Movie: Directed by Chris McKay. With Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes. A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4116284/","name":"The Lego Batman Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyNTEyOTY0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNzU3MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4116284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thesikhestgamers"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good Movie for the entire family!","reviewBody":"Another Lego Movie Spectacular! The movie's theme portrays a good overall message of staying loyal with your family and the responsibilities of raising one. The movie had many jokes which made the entire theater roar with laughter! Some jokes were overused, but still made it very funny! Will Arnett playing Batman is a very good choice! 

Will Arnett (Batman) works alone as a hero, however trying to hide is own identity as the richest man alive, Bruce Wayne. The movie has all the vilians, like, Bane, Poison Ivy, and much more! The Joker has evil plans set for the entire city. The Joke however has one mission the entire film, make Batman admit he is his favorite enemy. The sarcasm and joke of this is kinda repetitive and doesn't make sense at some times.

Overall, this movie is great and a must watch! Fun for the entire family, no matter what age or gender!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":139206,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2017-02-09","keywords":"lego,batmobile,dc comics,based on comic book,batman character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Extended TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi466269721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"There are big changes brewing in Gotham, and if Batman wants to save the city from the Joker's hostile takeover, he may have to drop the lone vigilante thing, try to work with others, and maybe learn to lighten up."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148418/","name":"Michael Cera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003021/","name":"Chris McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005154/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334381/","name":"Seth Grahame-Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stargirl
programme.desc: DC-jeva "Stargirl" prati srednjoškolku Courtney Whitmore dok nadahnjuje neočekivanu skupinu mladih junaka da zaustave zlikovce iz prošlosti. DC-jeva "Stargirl" prati srednjoškolku Courtney Whitmore dok nadahnjuje neočekivanu skupinu mladih junaka da zaustave zlikovce iz prošlosti. Ova nova drama daje novi pogled na Stargirl i prvi tim superheroja, Američko društvo pravde, u ovoj nepredvidivoj seriji koja se fokusira na lik koji je pokrenuo karijeru kreatora Geoffa Johnsa kao pisca stripova kad ju je osmislio 1999., s ljubavlju nadahnut svojom pokojnom sestrom koja je poginula u avionskoj nesreći.

programme.title: Oslo
Oslo
programme.desc: Oslo: Directed by Bartlett Sher. With Ruth Wilson, Andrew Scott, Karel Dobrý, Tobias Zilliacus. Recounts the true-life, previously secret, back-channel negotiations in the development of the pivotal 1990s Oslo Peace Accords between Israel and the Palestinian Liberation Organization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11790674/","name":"Oslo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTExMDVjNTktMTgxMC00NjBjLWEwYmQtMjcxY2UzMTNjZjQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQwOTQ1MzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Recounts the true-life, previously secret, back-channel negotiations in the development of the pivotal 1990s Oslo Peace Accords between Israel and the Palestinian Liberation Organization.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11790674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Aria_Athena"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Showcases how pride and stubbornness can get in the way of peace.","reviewBody":"If only people can sit down and talk. They didn't solve all, or even most of the issues, they didn't make years of hatred and violence disappear, but they made more progress that 40 years of official negotiations. Two people took a chance, then two more and just like that 10 people managed, at least for a little while, to stop a war.\n\nIt's not a great movie, the writing leaves a lot to be desired, but the acting is solid and it gets the job done. My main complaint is with the cinematography. Some parts look good, some have a terrible yellow filter over them and then a few scenes are straight up dipped into mustard.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3829,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-29","keywords":"1990s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4275945497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDVhMzgxNjQtYzAwOC00NWM1LWI0ZjctZWViMWFhYWY3MzUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDVhMzgxNjQtYzAwOC00NWM1LWI0ZjctZWViMWFhYWY3MzUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Adapted from the Tony Award-winning play of the same name, Oslo follows the secret back-channel talks, unlikely friendships, and quiet heroics of a small but committed group of Israelis and Palestinians, plus one Norwegian couple, that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords. Oslo stars Ruth Wilson as Mona Juul, a Norwegian foreign minister, and Andrew Scott as Terje Rod-Larsen, a Norwegian sociologist and Mona’s husband. The film is written by Tony-winning writer of the stage play J.T. Rogers and will be directed by Barlett Sher (Tony winner for South Pacific)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2235721/","name":"Ruth Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778831/","name":"Andrew Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0229859/","name":"Karel Dobrý"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2324389/","name":"Bartlett Sher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2774585/","name":"J.T. programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Iako je sputava Molly, dugogodišnja najbolja prijateljica i korporativna odvjetnica koja se sjajno snalazi pred raznim odborima, ali ne i s osjećajima, Issa je strastvena graditeljica zajednice iz Inglewooda čija neodlučnost često omete njezinu viziju. Radnja se nastavlja nedugo nakon što su obje prijateljice dobile nogu od svojih partnera. Peta i posljednja sezona prati naše glavne junakinje, uz smiješnu Kelli i zahtjevnu Tiffany, kako pokušavaju stati na noge i nastaviti sa životom.

programme.title: Ammonite
Amonit
programme.desc: Ammonite: Directed by Francis Lee. With Sarah White, Liam Thomas, Sam Parks, Kate Winslet. 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7983894/","name":"Ammonite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM3ZGZlMWUtMjY1OS00NjBkLWE4MjQtODJkMmQ1MzdjYzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7983894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reyesrh"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silence Art","reviewBody":"I just wanna point out that the scenes with no dialogue are the one's that say a lot ... Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cheche1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie but took a lot of liberties","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. The story, acting, pacing, editing, etc. was just fantastic. Affleck's directing was solid, and the suspense will keep you entertained right through to the last seconds. I loved it. 

It did have one irritating thing, though, kind of a big one. It pointed most of the accolades to Affleck's character and the CIA. This really was not true. It was Ken Taylor and the Canadians who really pulled 'the Canadian Caper' off so successfully.

"When Taylor heard a few years ago that Mendez had sold movie rights to his book (which, to be fair, is much more generous than the movie about Canada's role), "I said, 'Well, that's going to be interesting.'...."The movie's fun, it's thrilling, it's pertinent, it's timely," he said. "But look, Canada was not merely standing around watching events take place. The CIA was a junior partner."

"The old postscript sent the message that, for political reasons, Canada took the credit. A sarcastic kicker noted that Taylor received 112 citations. The clear implication was that he did not deserve them."(Sept/Oct., 2012, thestar.com)".

So the USA does another revision on history here. I believe 'Argo' goes this far. Yes, it's based on a true story - the movie does it's best to allude that it sticks to technical accuracy. And it really does, in some ways. Historical pictures of flag burners, rioters, gate climbers, etc.. up against Argo film stills run by during the credits make it seem that the facts were adhered to down to the tiniest detail. In reality, it wasn't Tony Mendez or the CIA who were responsible for the success of this operation; actually they were barely there. 

Since the movie premiered, Ben Affleck has added emphasis on the movie postscripts since then that gives kudos to the Canadians' role. This was after Ken Taylor politely complained, as a Canadian would tactfully do. But Affleck did this only after pressure from Taylor himself.

I can understand the need to spice up events to make them as exciting and entertaining as possible, don't get me wrong. But this film needs to let the audience know that more explicitly than it does, even after the changed postscripts.

Still, a really entertaining and riveting film, very well done, and easily worth seeing. As a matter of fact, don't miss it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":593452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Frozen II: Directed by Chris Buck, Jennifer Lee. With Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Josh Gad, Jonathan Groff. Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4520988/","name":"Frozen II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0YjYyZGMtN2U0Ni00YmY4LWJkZTItYTMyMjY3NGYyMTJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4520988/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gunsjoe"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow they've gone a bit backwards","reviewBody":"This movie has beautiful visuals. The scenes and animation is breathtaking. I liked that very much.

Here's a controversial opinion; I quite liked the music and songs as well though It lacks the iconic catchy tunes from the first one.

My biggest complaint and the one thing that let this down is the story. Its way too simplistic. Now granted the first one wasn't Mark-Twain like either but you get the feeling that it was more substantial than this and as an adult there was more in the first one for you than this.

I'm still rating this pretty good because as much as I'm personally underwhelmed by the story, I'm not the target audience. This is a movie for little children and I guess they might have a different opinion. I wouldn't know for sure since I dont have children to take to the movies. I would like to, but I need to find a wife first for that to happen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":154425,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"autumn,anthropomorphic snowman,princess,disney animated sequel,magic","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Frozen II Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2143993625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNWYwYzItNzJhMi00YjljLTkxODMtODRlODQ2ZWE1ZTJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNWYwYzItNzJhMi00YjljLTkxODMtODRlODQ2ZWE1ZTJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068338/","name":"Kristen Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579953/","name":"Idina Menzel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601644/","name":"Jennifer Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601644/","name":"Jennifer Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0026153/","name":"Hans Christian Andersen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lego Movie
Lego
programme.desc:
The Lego Movie: Directed by Christopher Miller, Phil Lord. With Will Arnett, Elizabeth Banks, Craig Berry, Alison Brie. An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1490017/","name":"The Lego Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg4MDk1ODExN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzIyNjg3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1490017/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mutiaraherawati"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strong story in a very creative way","reviewBody":"If you watch the trailer and you think its just gonna be a fun stop-motion animated Lego movie, you were wrong. The Lego Movie is beyond fun. its creative and it brings back a lot childhood memories. The story was amazing, the jokes were hilarious, and they have great intention in details.

But, the most important thing, the movie remind us to be creative. Because sometimes, As we grow up, in someway, we stop being creative and just follow the rules and instruction. For adults, this movie will bring back your childhood memories and how you used to play randomly with those Lego. And for a kids, you'll just love this movie, and definitely makes you want to play with your own Lego.

totally worth watching movie! even your grandparents will enjoy this movie! 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":336956,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2014-02-12","keywords":"lego,computer animation,good cop bad cop,based on toy,crossover","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2178131993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkyMjA1ODQzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ2NzMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkyMjA1ODQzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ2NzMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together.
